alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 9:45PM CDT until August 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flood Stage. Farm and pasture land begins to flood. Minor flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Pacific 15.0 14.1 13.9 9.8 6.1 3.6 2.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
